wikipedia_page.main: Brian Hill (31 July 1941 – 27 October 2016) was an English footballer who played in the Football League for Bristol City, Coventry City and Torquay United.

response: |Youngest player to start a first-team match ||  Brian Hill, 16 years 273 days (vs Gillingham, 1958)
